data.API_KEY: Api key. This is in your dev dashboard.
data.TARIFF: Your tariff. This will determine the rates we retrieve.
data.TARIFF_CODE: Your tariff code (e.g. E-1R-AGILE-18-02-21-C). This can be found in your dev dashboard.

error.both_electric_not_supplied: Both electric MPAN and Serial Number must be supplied or both should be empty
error.both_gas_not_supplied: Both gas MPRN and Serial Number must be supplied or both should be empty
